short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Toggle outlines on all elements to help debug CSS

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CSS Debug with Pesticide is a browser extension that helps developers debug CSS by outlining each element on the page. It provides a visual representation of the box model, making it easier to identify layout issues and understand the structure of the page.
